ptolemy.kernel.util

Interface ValueListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInitializableParameter, ActorEditorGraphController, ActorNameIcon, ActorViewerGraphController, AreaEventType, AttributeExpressionAttribute, AttributeValueAttribute, AttributeValueIcon, BaseUnit, BasicGraphController, BoxedValueIcon, BoxedValuesIcon, CachedSDFScheduler, CaseGraphFrame.CaseGraphController, ChoiceParameter, ChoiceStringParameter, ColorAttribute, ConstraintMonitor, ConstraintMonitorIcon, CopyCatIcon, DefaultIconLink, DefaultIconScript, DefaultTitle, DoubleRangeParameter, DygraphsJSPlotterAttribute, EditIconGraphController, ExpertParameter, FileParameter, FilePortParameter, FSMGraphController, FSMViewerGraphController, HTMLImage, HTMLText, HTMLTextPosition, IconLink, IconScript, InterfaceAutomatonGraphController, IntRangeParameter, JSPlotterAttribute, KeplerXMLIcon, LinkTarget, LinkToOpenTableaux, LiveLink, LocationAttribute, LocationParameter, MirrorPortParameter, NameParameter, OptimizingSDFScheduler, Parameter, ParameterDisplayIconScript, PasswordAttribute, PortParameter, Priority, ProvenanceRecorder, PtolemyQuery, RunnableGraphController, Script, SDFScheduler, SDFTestScheduler, SemanticType, SharedParameter, SingletonParameter, SizeAttribute, StreamValueListener, StringConstantParameter, StringParameter, SVGIcon, TabbedKeplerGraphFrame.TabbedKeplerController, TemporaryVariable, TestSharedParameter, Title, TypeAttribute, UpdatedValueIcon, ValueIcon, Variable, WebContent, WindowPropertiesAttribute, WithIconGraphController, XMLIcon

    public interface ValueListener
    This is an interface for listeners that are notified when the value of an object implementing Settable changes.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 1.0
    Author:
    Edward A. Lee
    See Also:
    Variable
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Green (cxh)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Green (eal)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void valueChanged(Settable settable)
      React to the fact that the specified Settable has changed.

      • valueChanged

        void valueChanged(Settable settable)
        React to the fact that the specified Settable has changed.
        Parameters:
        settable - The object that has changed value.
